Text:
As soon as I can finish DL'ing this, I will leave my BitTorrent client open FOREVER if I have to so there is plenty of seeding for everyone out there to be able to enjoy this band.

I have seen these guys live 8 times, and own all of their albums. Easily Top 3 for me, of all time. WILL NOT DISAPPOINT
Works great, very interesting band.  I'd never heard them before.  Surprisingly fast download too.  Thanks for sharing!
